caption.p: Anthocharis cardamines flying period and observation frequency (number of regional observations) in south ( black line), central ( dark gray line), and north ( gray line) regions according to the 2010 “species gateway” data base ( http://www.artportalen.se). Data were fitted to a Gaussian curve. Vertical dashed lines indicate the starting date of our samplings. Distribution map: Eliasson et al. ( 2005); Photograph by Christer Wiklund shows a male A. cardamines nectaring on Cardamine pratensis
